name: Slender Man Chapter 3: In Your Dreams
name_original: Slender Man Chapter 3: In Your Dreams
description:
The next free chapter in the indie horror simulator smash hit series. This is a sequel to Slender Man Chapter 1:Alone Free and Slender Man Chapter 2:Survive Free.

Experience first person horror as you try to outwit and outrun Slender Man and his companion Slenderella. Wide open levels and detailed 3D graphics will leave your gasping for breath as you fight one on one with the internet legend. Are you brave enough?
